title: Lambda Secrets Manager using Java SDK
description: Lambda function retrieving a secret from Secrets Manager using Java SDK.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern stores a secret in Secrets Manager. A Lambda function uses AWS SDK for Java to read the secret in the init phase, outside the handler.

bullets.text: Retrieve AWS Secrets Manager secrets in Java applications
